title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 22, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the poet and translator Kenneth Rexroth (1905-1982), who mentored the Beat poets but became disillusioned as they turned into “hipsters.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the poet and translator Kenneth Rexroth (1905-1982), who mentored the Beat poets but became disillusioned as they turned into “hipsters.”
